item.title: Emerson 将以每股 265 美元的价格收购 AspenTech 其余股份
item.description: 艾默生电气和 AspenTech 两家公司本周一表示，艾默生电气将以每股 265 美元的价格收购其尚未持有的 AspenTech 全部流通股，股权估值为 72 亿美元。【原文：Emerson Electric will acquire all outstanding shares of AspenTech it does not already own for $265 per share, valuing the stake at $7.2 billion, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西 JBS 收购曼蒂凯拉公司股份，进军鸡蛋行业
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 周一表示，已同意收购 Mantiqueira Alimentos 的股份，这标志着这家食品巨头进入鸡蛋行业，Mantiqueira 的交易估值为 19 亿雷亚尔（3.21 亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS has agreed to buy a stake in Mantiqueira Alimentos, it said on Monday, marking the food giant's entry into the egg sector in a deal that valued Mantiqueira at 1.9 billion reais ($321 million).】

item.title: 聚焦：在特朗普回国之前，一些美国顶尖企业已对多元化承诺漠不关心
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统上周发起一场全国性的废除平等机会倡议运动之前，一些美国大公司在提升女性地位方面取得的进展有限，而且正在淡化或放弃平等机会倡议，这凸显了企业优先事项的转变。【原文：Some large U.S. companies had made limited progress in promoting women and were diluting or abandoning equal opportunity initiatives even before President Donald Trump launched last week a nationwide campaign to scrap them, underscoring a shift in corporate priorities.】

item.title: 全球经济从容应对特朗普的猜谜游戏
item.description: 全球经济政策制定者已经做好了迎接美国新政府经济风暴的准备，但唐纳德-特朗普却出人意料地保持了克制。【原文：Global economic policymakers had been braced for an economic firestorm from the new U.S. administration but instead got a surprisingly restrained start from Donald Trump, who remains big on rhetoric but more cautious on action - for now.】

item.title: 在雪佛龙公司的主导下，哈萨克斯坦石油日产量创历史新高
item.description: 据官方数据显示，哈萨克斯坦最大的油田--由雪佛龙（Chevron）公司主导的腾吉兹（Tengiz）油田刚刚开始扩建，其石油日产量就在周日创下了 278,499 公吨的历史新高。【原文：Oil production in Kazakhstan reached a daily record high of 278,499 metric tons on Sunday just after it embarked on an expansion of its largest oilfield, Chevron-led Tengiz, according to official data.】

item.title: 安科拉公司提名九名候选人进入美国钢铁公司董事会
item.description: 激进投资者 Ancora 在报告持有美国钢铁公司 0.18% 的股份后，已提名九名候选人进入该公司董事会。 美国钢铁公司周一表示，在报告持有该公司 0.18% 的股份后，该公司董事会已提名了九名候选人。【原文：Activist investor Ancora has nominated nine candidates to U.S. Steel's board of directors after reporting a 0.18% stake in the steelmaker, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: AT&T 的捆绑式 5G 和光纤计划提升了假日季度的用户数量
item.description: 本周一，AT&T 公司第四季度无线用户增长超出预期，这主要得益于其结合了 5G 移动和高速光纤数据服务的打折优惠计划需求强劲。【原文：AT&T's fourth-quarter wireless subscriber growth surpassed expectations on Monday, fueled by strong demand for its discounted premium plans combining 5G mobile with high-speed fiber data services.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者寄希望于更便宜的电动车型在 2024 年低迷后提振销量
item.description: 特斯拉（Tesla）将于本周三公布季度业绩，投资者将关注该公司低价车型的更多细节，因为一些人预计这款价格更低的汽车将帮助该公司实现今年将交付量提高多达30%的目标。 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的资金支持下赢得11月大选以来，这家全球最有价值的汽车制造商的股市估值飙升了60%以上，达到1.3万亿美元。投资者押注新政府将放松对特斯拉正在开发的自动驾驶汽车系统的监管。【原文：Tesla investors will look for more details on the automaker's lower-priced model when it reports quarterly results on Wednesday as some expect the cheaper car to help the company hit its goal to increase deliveries by up to 30% this year. The world's most valuable automaker has seen its stock market valuation soar more than 60% to $1.3 trillion since President Donald Trump won November's election with the financial backing of Tesla CEO Elon Musk. Investors are betting the new administration will ease regulation on self-driving vehicle systems that Tesla is developing.】

item.title: 特斯拉加入法庭，挑战欧盟对中国电动汽车征收的关税
item.description: 据欧盟法院网站周一发布的一份文件显示，特斯拉已联合宝马和中国生产商向欧盟法院（CJEU）提起诉讼，反对欧盟对中国产电动汽车征收关税。【原文：Tesla has joined BMW and Chinese producers in filing a challenge at the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) against EU tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, according to a filing on the court's website on Monday.】

item.title: 上午竞标：AI, aye, aye
item.description: 欧洲金融和市场即时新闻编辑阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper, Finance and Markets Breaking News Editor, Europe.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国 "茶壶 "炼油厂因新燃油税影响而停产
item.description: 炼油厂和贸易消息人士称，由于中国新的关税和税收政策使中国东部的几家独立炼油厂陷入更深的亏损，这些炼油厂已经停止运营或计划进行无限期维护。【原文：Several independent oil refineries in eastern China have halted operations, or plan to do so, for indefinite maintenance periods as new Chinese tariff and tax policies plunge them deeper into losses, refinery and trade sources said.】

item.title: 加拿大央行可能降息 25 个基点，并给出关税影响分析
item.description: 经济学家和分析师表示，加拿大央行本周极有可能将其关键基准利率下调25个基点，而且人们普遍预计央行将就美国潜在关税的影响提供分析。【原文：The Bank of Canada will most likely trim its key benchmark rate by 25 basis points this week and is widely expected to offer an analysis on the impact of potential U.S. tariffs, economists and analysts said.】

item.title: 尽管有特朗普的议程，但大石油公司今年并不急于 "钻宝贝钻"。
item.description: 华尔街预计，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普呼吁 "钻井，宝贝，钻井"，但美国石油和天然气公司仍将在2025年控制支出，并继续专注于为股东创造回报。【原文：Wall Street expects U.S. oil and gas companies to keep a lid on spending in 2025 and keep their focus on generating shareholder returns, despite calls by President Donald Trump to "drill, baby, drill."】

item.title: 加拿大大选在即，令希望增加回报的股票投资者欢欣鼓舞
item.description: 一些投资者表示，加拿大保守党政府有望在今年当选，这将使加拿大股市受益，因为保守党政府倾向于对企业有利的经济政策，这可能有助于减少与美国的贸易不确定性。【原文：The Canadian stock market stands to benefit from the expected election this year of a Conservative government that favors business-friendly economic policies and that could help reduce trade uncertainty with the United States, some investors say.】

item.title: 中国 DeepSeek 引发人工智能市场溃败
item.description: 周一，全球科技股纷纷下滑，原因是中国的一种人工智能折扣模式大受欢迎，动摇了投资者对人工智能行业对高科技芯片的巨大需求的信心。【原文：Technology shares around the world slid on Monday as a surge in popularity of a Chinese discount artificial intelligence model shook investors' faith in the AI sector's voracious demand for high-tech chips.】

item.title: 瑞安航空预计在夏季结束前交付 38 架波音 737 飞机
item.description: 瑞安航空首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周一表示，如果美国联邦航空管理局批准交付更多的飞机，瑞安航空预计将在夏季结束前收到38架波音737飞机，到10月份可能会收到42架。【原文：Ryanair expects to receive 38 Boeing 737 planes by the end of the summer and possibly up to 42 by October if the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration approves deliveries of the additional jets, Ryanair CEO Michael O'Leary said on Monday.】

item.title: 通胀忧虑再起助推油价反弹
item.description: 投资者正在抢购原油期货，以对冲美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收贸易关税将导致全球通胀回升的风险，这为近期因加强对俄罗斯制裁而引发的油价反弹增添了动力。【原文：Investors are snapping up crude oil futures as a hedge against the risk that U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened trade tariffs will cause a resurgence in global inflation, adding momentum to a recent rally in oil prices sparked by a tightening of sanctions on Russia.】

item.title: 纳斯达克期货暴跌，中国推动人工智能发展令大科技公司震怒
item.description: 由于一种廉价的中国人工智能模型大受欢迎，引发了人工智能相关股票的抛售，包括英伟达（Nvidia）在内的超级大盘股受到的打击最为严重。【原文：Futures linked to the tech-heavy Nasdaq tumbled on Monday as the overwhelming popularity of an inexpensive Chinese artificial intelligence model sparked a selloff in AI-related shares, with megacap stocks including Nvidia the worst hit.】

item.title: 德国 1 月份商业景气指数意外上升
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，由于对当前经济形势的评估更为积极，1 月份德国企业士气出乎意料地有所提高。【原文：German business morale unexpectedly improved in January thanks to a more positive assessment of the current economic situation, a survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 审计师在判断企业的环境诉求时将获得更严格的指引
item.description: 全球审计行业道德监督机构主席告诉路透社，国际审计师在评估公司的环境、社会和治理要求时，已经获得了关于检查内容和检查方式的新指南，这是提高严格性和一致性的努力的一部分。【原文：International auditors have been given new guidance on what to check when assessing firms' environmental, social and governance claims - and how - as part of efforts to increase rigour and consistency, the chair of the industry's global ethics watchdog told Reuters.】

item.title: 流动性担忧加剧，中国万科首席执行官和董事长辞职
item.description: 负债累累的房地产开发商中国万科（China Vanke）周一表示，公司董事长郁亮和首席执行官祝九胜已申请辞去董事长和首席执行官职务。【原文：Indebted property developer China Vanke said on Monday its chairman Yu Liang and chief executive Zhu Jiusheng applied to resign from their positions, amid intensifying worries over the company's liquidity as it faces several looming debt maturity deadlines this month.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长就央行丧失独立性发出警告
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一表示，中央银行的独立性在世界部分地区受到质疑，对政策施加更大的政治影响可能会加剧经济波动。【原文：Central bank independence is being questioned in parts of the world and greater political influence over policy could increase economic volatility, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Monday.】

item.title: 在 MPS 意外竞购商业银行后，意大利 Mediobanca 和 Monte dei Paschi 亏损扩大
item.description: 周一开盘，意大利 Mediobanca 和 Monte dei Paschi（MPS）股价下跌，扩大了上周五的跌幅，此前国家支持的贷款机构出人意料地向这家商业银行发起了 133 亿欧元（139.3 亿美元）的竞购。【原文：Shares in Italy's Mediobanca and Monte dei Paschi (MPS) fell at market open on Monday, extending Friday's losses, after the state-backed lender launched a surprise 13.3-billion-euro ($13.93 billion) bid on the merchant bank.】

item.title: 减值拖累盈利下降，巴斯夫股价下跌 3
item.description: 巴斯夫周五晚些时候公布了减记报告，年度盈利下降幅度低于预期，该公司股价在法兰克福早盘交易中下跌了 3%。【原文：Shares in BASF fell 3% in early Frankfurt trading after the chemical company late on Friday reported write-downs and a drop in annual earnings below estimates.】

item.title: 律师团体敦促全面改革美国银行特许程序以鼓励新进入者
item.description: 一群律师在给即将上任的银行机构领导层的一封信中写道，美国当局必须简化获得银行执照的程序，强调该行业需要适应由金融科技公司主导的时代。【原文：U.S. authorities must simplify the process to obtain bank charters, a group of lawyers wrote in a letter to the incoming leadership of banking agencies, emphasizing the industry's need to adapt in an era dominated by fintech companies.】

item.title: 中国 DeepSeek 引发人工智能市场溃败
item.description: 周一，纳斯达克指数期货暴跌，日本科技股也出现下滑，原因是中国的一种人工智能折扣模式大受欢迎，动摇了投资者对人工智能盈利能力的信心，也动摇了该行业对高科技芯片的巨大需求。【原文：Nasdaq futures slumped and technology shares slid in Japan on Monday as surging popularity of a Chinese discount artificial intelligence model wobbled investors' faith in the profitability of AI and the sector's voracious demand for high-tech chips.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛集团主席罗密欧-拉舍尔下台
item.description: 瑞士宝盛银行（Julius Baer）董事长罗密欧-拉切尔（Romeo Lacher）周一表示，该银行将继续对管理层进行调整，这一调整始于一年前，当时该银行因受累于倒闭的房地产集团 Signa 而蒙受重大损失。【原文：The chairman of Julius Baer, Romeo Lacher, is to step down, the Swiss bank said on Monday as it continued a shake-up of management that began a year ago after it suffered major losses from exposure to collapsed property group Signa.】

item.title: 富士媒体受性行为不端指控影响，称董事长和电视台负责人将下台
item.description: 日本富士媒体周一表示，董事长金能修二和电视部门负责人港幸一（Koichi Minato）将因公司一名高管在一次活动中涉嫌性行为不端而下台。【原文：Japan's Fuji Media said on Monday that Chairman Shuji Kanoh and the head of its TV unit Koichi Minato would step down amidst a probe into alleged sexual misconduct at an event organised by one of its executives.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利分析师将 LVMH 上调至 "增持 "评级
item.description: 投资银行摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将法国奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的评级从 "等权重 "上调至 "增持"。【原文：Investment bank Morgan Stanley has raised its rating on French luxury goods giant LVMH to 'overweight' from 'equal weight'.】

item.title: 瑞安航空因票价上涨利润超预期，但下调客流量预期
item.description: 欧洲最大的低成本航空公司瑞安航空（Ryanair）周一公布了截至 12 月 31 日的三个月的税后利润，超过了分析师的预测，但由于波音飞机交付延迟，该公司下调了客运量预期。【原文：Ryanair , Europe's largest low-cost carrier, posted an after-tax profit for the three-month period ended Dec. 31 that beat analysts' forecasts on Monday, but revised down its passenger outlook on delays in Boeing aircraft delivery.】
